alert.note: Alert for White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 15 at 8:37PM PDT until September 15 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Becky Fire Burnscar in... Northeastern White Pine County in northeastern Nevada... * Until 1000 PM PDT. * At 837 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Becky Fire Burn Scar. Between 0.1 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.1 to 0.4 inches in 15 minutes. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Excessive rainfall over the burn scar will result in debris flow moving through the burn area. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms in and around the Becky Fire Burn Scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flooding of areas in and around the Becky Fire Burn Scar. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... the Becky Burn Scar in White Pine County. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.1-0.4 INCHES IN 15 MINUTES
info.instruction: Move away from recently burned areas. Life-threatening flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry arroyos is likely. The heavy rains will likely trigger rockslides, mudslides and debris flows in steep terrain, especially in and around these areas.
